articles.author: Adam Rittenberg
articles.title: Curt Cignetti not loving Indiana prep before Bama game - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana coach Curt Cignetti is not thrilled with his team's preparation after landing in Southern California.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES -- A day before top-seeded Indiana's College Football Playoff game against Alabama, Hoosiers coach Curt Cignetti expressed some frustration with his team's on-site preparation in Southern… [+1610 chars]
